question: Many people believe that music is just a form of entertainment, whilst others believe that music has a much larger impact on society today. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
text: Music plays a very important role in today's life. While certain people believe ,it is just a form of relaxation. Others feel, that songs make a tremendous effect on  society. In my opinion, communities are much influenced by music for widening  socialism between individuals and improving the solution in the educational domain.

Musical themes are effective for developing socialism among people. Especially, in the event of social gatherings. Individuals tend to speak with  unknown people to create a well-known contact. For example, last week , we had a party with people from different communities and help us to know each other. In addition, the person uses  music for relaxation and stress buster. They said that the theme has some medication to overcome workplace pressure. Undoubtedly, it is an excellent tool for combining people as one as well as peacefulness in their personal life.

Music theme plays an extraordinary growth in the medical department as therapy and provides an effective treatment to the community.The physician is surprised by noticeable improvement while treating  cancer patients and their recovery is outstanding when compared to other medications.For instance,an institute next to my flat educate many physically disabled people for  gaining confidence in society.Moreover,songs are used in an educational department as  therapy and provide an effective treatment to the community.All benefits  mentioned in a statement indicate that communities have a greater benefit.
To conclude,music is a language for everyone in this society. It is contributed many benefits to an individual as well as to a group of people.However,society has a larger advantage than others.

error_list.error: Change the form of the verb
error_list.error_des: It appears that your sentence or clause uses an incorrect form of the verb indicate. Consider changing it.
